name: 行為生態學
goals: Lectures and reading assignments will introduce students to some of the main topics in behavioral ecology
In-class discussion of research papers will improve students’ ability to think critically
syllabus:
Week1: Class Introduction

Week2: Natural selection, ecology and behavior

Week3: Economic decisions and the individual

Week4: Predators vs. prey

Week5: Competing for resources

Week6: Living in groups

Week7: Sexual selection

Week8: Exam I

Week9: Parental care and family conflicts

Week10: Mating systems

Week11: Sex allocation

Week12: Social behaviors

Week13: Cooperation

Week14: Altruism and conflict in the social insects

Week15: Communication and signals

Week16: Exame II

Week17: Class discussion

Week18: Class discussion
